website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Osu NM gained some positive reviews for its unique look and its comfortable design. Many were drawn to its lightweight nature, which apparently made it great for many activities. The adjustable strap also received some praise for allowing the runners to change the fit easily. But there were complaints, most prominently of a stench that was apparently difficult to eliminate.
pros: Several runners noted that the Puma Osu NM was roomy enough to accommodate natural toe splay
A number of runners found the shoe to be very comfortable right out of the box
It looked very appealing, according to consumers
they received compliments from people while they were wearing it
Several reviewers prized the easy on/off characteristic of this shoe due to the absence of laces
The upper was breathable and it kept the foot cool and dry, noted a purchaser
Many testers lauded the lightweight nature of this shoe, stating that it allowed them to wear it for many activities
The price was affordable, according to a lot of those who have purchased it
The hook-and-loop strap made it easier for runners to adjust the fit
‘Comfortable’ was used frequently to describe the experience when wearing this shoe
Quite a number of people who are on their feet during work really appreciated the impact-absorbing cushioning and support
cons: According to a purchaser, the underfoot cushioning started to sag off after only a few miles
Several consumers complained of a bad smell from the material and reported that it was difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Very good lightweight shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, nice fit, I have a true but very narrow size 14 foot, and these fit perfect. These shoes are lightweight and extremely comfortable. I use them for light industrial warehouse work and they are perfect for that. They are still brand new, I only had them for a week, but my initial response is they are fantastic. My only concern is, I hope the velcro strap holds up, and keep its promise as these shoes get older. Besides that minor concern, great shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Ol Sparky

customer_reviews.title: cool foot bondage
customer_reviews.text: These are too tight on my wide-ish feet and not as comfortable as my previous Pumas. They may just have less "give" in the width, but they feel like foot bondage after a couple hours. Hopefully, they'll stretch with wear. If you have narrower feet, these seem like very good, well-made shoes with a very cool look.
customer_reviews.author: zorito

customer_reviews.title: A Little Discomfort = better fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the style. I have many styles of Puma that fit much better much sooner than these did though. This particular style took about 4 days for my feet to really get comfortable in. I got them in the same size of 10.5 that all of my other Puma shoes are in so there was no question about size. Still, although a few days off slight discomfort, they feel much better now. I wore them the first 3 days straight in order to break them in. I'm an RN and work 3 12 hour shifts per week.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these Puma shoes several years ago except with the red trim on gray, and I've received dozens of compliments on the style. People want to know where I got them. Now, I have new Pumas but with blue trim, and my old shoes are still good, so I can color coordinate my clothes with my shoes twice as often. Very cool. They are also very comfortable and easy to put on. I recommend buying a 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: ertingstrom

customer_reviews.title: Far smaller than it should have been
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 14 shoe across most main brands. Occasionally I will need to get a 15 if the 14 is too small. I ordered a size 14 and it felt several sizes too small, it wasn't even close to being a fit. The build quality and overall product looked good, but unfortunately I don't think I can trust the size system.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Boston - Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Grear design. Too Narrow. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my regular size first to try it on and as mentioned in previous reviews, the shoes are narrow. I returned and ordered half a size bigger. However, I noticed that the shoe for the right-leg is narrower than the left shoe. I have wider feet and these shoes are not meant for ppl with wide feet. It's great design and look but NOT wide enough. My feet now hurts just after wearing them for 15-20min. I have used nike/ mizuno/asics and never had problems with my regular sized fit (never had to buy bigger size). Hope Puma puts more thought in their design. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Richie FC

customer_reviews.title: Good style, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality simply isn't there on this one. I've had numerous pairs of Pumas and have never had a problem, so maybe I just got a bad pair. I've worn these shoes for a few months now and the grey bottom is peeling off in spots and a couple small chunks have actually torn away. I don't even use these for running and they take very little abuse. I'd hate to see how they would hold up when used as actual running shoes. I do like the style, they are comfortable, and they weren't expensive, so all things considered they're okay.
customer_reviews.author: |J|

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SOMEONE WITH WIDE FEET
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit smaller than i had expected, so order a half size bigger. If you have wide feet, then these are not for you. Other than that,I really loved these shoes. At the time, no one else had anything like them. Very comfortable and stylish .
customer_reviews.author: Anand Ramtahal

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size large and they are great!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star as I followed others recommendation of buying 1/2 size larger than normal... Fits great--- I wear them 10 hours daily in a warehouse environment. Concrete floors or thin carpet in offices. So far I like them. Plan on buying more to keep in reserve.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great looking mens velcro sneaker that fits perfectly and is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy finding men slip on shoes with velcro. We hate laces they are always coming undone. However, most mens sized sneakers with velcro are for people in the nursing home and aren't very stylish. This shoe looks great. It fits very well, and is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyDoo

customer_reviews.title: Great accessibility and styling
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has been great for my son who is on the Autism Spectrum, who finding stylish velcro shoes for has become a challenge as he has moved into adult sizes. He can independently put them on, they seem to give good support and they have held up well for an active boy (this is our second pair).
customer_reviews.author: SAMBa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Others are correct, this is a very narrow shoe, but I think that helps it properly hold your foot. Initially, this narrowness was a bit awkward but after a little break in, it does feel quite natural. They're very comfortable and I absolutely love not having to fumble around with laces. The velcro is also just the right balance between strength and easy peelibility. It also doesn't attract too much lint/loose fibers. These might not be appropriate for actual runners but they are quite good for light jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly, chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes smell really bad. I've been waiting for the smell to go away for about three weeks, but they still have a bad odor. I would not recommend buying the secondary do this manufacturing problem I have now had the shoes for three months and they still smell. I'm about to throw them away because I can't stand wearing them. They look great, feel good, but really smell like a chemical that is unhealthy for you. Too bad I won't be buying the shoes again it was my second pair. I did try to return them to Amazon but unfortunately The return window was closed. Lesson learned I guess. Amazon is not always great
customer_reviews.author: Mahhk

customer_reviews.title: uhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I like them I just don't love them....I hate the Velcro on the sides of 2 of the straps ...they don't look right if they're not perfect inline with the others and the Velcro pulls and pics at my clothes which I hate... They fit right but just annoying...
customer_reviews.author: ArtnPrint

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves puma so that is why he wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves puma so that is why he wanted another pair. This pair fit perfectly, unfortunately, they came in a box that was so musty that I can not believe they were actually ship. When the shipping box was opened, the box with the shoes and the shoes were full of a musty smell. We are still airing the shoes out as the smell is still there. I have tried everything to eliminate the smell and still has the smell, but not as strong when my husband first opened the box. I made him keep the shoes in the garage as it was very overbearing in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice but they hurt my heels. I would not recommend for people that stay on their feet for prolonged periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: shaggylovesoccer

customer_reviews.title: I always struggle finding comfortable running shoes - more likely due to my poor ...
customer_reviews.text: I always struggle finding comfortable running shoes - more likely due to my poor technique than due to lack of good shoes - but these are great. They're comfortable, the shock absorption is superb and they breathe really well - my feet just don't seem to sweat in them. Only downside I could think of is somewhat goofy look - but since I wear them for running and occasionally travel, I really couldn't care less.
customer_reviews.author: Andro

customer_reviews.title: Walking on Air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes wear like the favorite pair of gloves you have, you always keep them in a safe location when not on,so the dog doesn't to them. They are so light and comfortable you keep them on. I have always wore my nice shoes paining or working around the house until they are wore out. Not these, I bought a pair to go out with and the the old ones now are dedicated for working . I get numerous compliments on the shoes and the price i couldn't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Alan Andre

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size up, they are a bit narrow but fit well. Easy on and easy off, which was the whole reason I got them. First shoes Ive owned without shoelaces and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: piRskwayrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! This is the 3rd pair we have purchased. They hold up great! He grows out of them before they wear out. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: No tie tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I did read other reviews and order 1/2 size up. They are for my teen son who does not like to tie his shoes. They are stylish and comfortable and he doesn't get bullied like he did when he wore other brand slip on shoes. Other kids now ask where he got his cool shoes.
customer_reviews.author: 3xBlessed

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: i love these shoes!! this makes my 5th pair! the blue/dark grey/white are a little darker blue than the picture shows which is perfectly fine with me i absolutely love the color and the way they fit! like a glove. i have to order a half size bigger than i wear so take that into consideration when purchasing. however, these shoes are amazing and that is why i keep BUYING them lol. hold together well and perfect for nursing shoes :) puma rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great pair of fashion trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers. Perfect fit. Look even better than on the site. Puma always a safe bet. Delivered early. All round very satisfying experience with Amazon as usual!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PUMA men's Osu running shoe
customer_reviews.text: First of all, MAKE sure you read the reviews before you order these shoes. The styling is killer, they look great on your feet, but make sure you get the next size up because these run small and narrow. I realize there's not much you can do about the narrow part because these only come in medium width. My first pair were returned because they were just too tight. I wear a 9.5, and had to re-order a size 10. These fit way better, but don't plan on wearing thick socks, because they'll be too tight. These will be great for warm weather and I look forward to wearing them then.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Not True Sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers warned the shoe might be narrow and/or not otherwise true to size. I didn't listen...and they were right. I really coveted these shoes in Scarlet & Grey. I wear a 13D...these are advertised 13 D...but not so. I returned the shoes thanks to Amazon Prime. I meant to check to see where the shoes were constructed; I have found that running shoes constructed in Viet Nam typically are NOT true to size. I found this in Asics and in Brooks. U.S and China seem to construct the best shoe. I should have asked before ordering. I am now warry in ordering future Puma's.
customer_reviews.author: Drago

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was NOT good. It also seemed little tight. I didn't think it was worth the money, hence returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyasla

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking, but had to return them. Maybe got defective ones?
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking sneakers, BUT, for some reason, the ones I got did not feel the same in one foot and the other. The sole tries to fit "exactly" the sole of the foot, and if it is just a little "off", one can feel your foot going sideways even standing up. Had to return these, unfortunately. After returning them, got the PUMA Men's Carson Runner Slip-On Shoe. These are PERFECT. Be sure to try these shoes immediately, and if needed, return them.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroman

customer_reviews.title: I really do love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these shoes. I mean, if you could wear pillows as shoes, they would look like these shoes. They also have a unique look, everybody has a positive opinion about the design. I live in NYC so these freakish looking shoes have a home here. they are light and airy. I don't have to stop and tie my shoes while on a date and I can slip right out of them when I need to get busy with my date.
customer_reviews.author: ruperto ruiz jr

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks great...they don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I just recived these shoes and did not get what i wanted, i recived a womens shoe and not even the correct color...the shoes look great if they had fit i would not have been worried, but they do not fit. I understand if it is a common mistake that someone made, but the color was wrong, the size was wrong and the shoe was for a female.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Smells moldy, but fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of returning them. I love just about everything about them - even tho they are snug they are stretchy enough where it's OK. HOWEVER this is my second pair that I had to return - they smell like mold. Perhaps it's something in the warehouse/factory that they are stored at. This pair does not smell as bad as the pair I ordered back in 11/14, BUT it's the same smell nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Stinky packaging
customer_reviews.text: There was a musty smell...I discarded all paper and the box and aired the shoes for several days...hopefully, they will be fine because they were a gift (without box)! Stinky! Shoes themselves are fine, if the smell goes away, my son wears this style because they are easy to pull on...this is his fifth pair. He only has one hand to pull them on, so recommend for anyone with similar disability.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: Great regular shoes but not for workout
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes regularly with jeans but they are in no way workout shoes. They are stylish and looks trendy but they are not meant for working our or jogging. I have own these shoes for 6 years now and they are still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Puma has always been my favorite go to brand. This shoe in particular is awesome. People usually end up admiring the design and color of my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Allan J. Bangera

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and feel good on!
customer_reviews.text: I watched these for awhile finally I decided to get them. I have owned other Puma's and was pleased with them. These didn't let me down. I use them as a dressy sneaker and had a few compliments on them. Oh yeah, I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Cool look, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the shoes, they fit somewhat snug but I guess they need to be since there are no laces. They are great to wear for a few hours, however I don't workout in them because they are just too snug. Maybe a half size larger would be better but I'm alright with these.
customer_reviews.author: RayCay

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers have had a strong musty smell to them ...
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers have had a strong musty smell to them since we took them out of the box. I didn't notice the smell when I first received the sneakers so I kept them in the box and put them in my son's closet. When I went to take them out a couple of months later the smell was very strong. I tried spraying them with Febreze several times and running them thru the washing machine but they still smell. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: idabean

customer_reviews.title: These have been great for my handicapped son
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my handicapped son. Easy on (he has no patience struggling with shoes), and no red marks on his toes or heels from the shoes rubbing. They look nice, too - not like "old-man velcro" shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Timsmom

customer_reviews.title: Puma Men's Osu NM
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for their looks- and was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable and lightweight they were. I have since purchased8 pairs! I use them at work at the hospital - they go great with my scrubs and also are great for walking the dog- esp in the early AM when i am too lazy to tie shoes. They are becoming my version of the "today sponge" from Seineld- -hopefully they won't go extinct!Nice assortment of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: daddyrick

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried when reviews all said to get 1/2 size higher, child wears 6 3/4...got 7 and was perfect. Received these just days ago, so no way to evaluate mileage yet. 5th star rides on that. Welcome product as "Velcro/ Autism Spectrum" offers few choices....so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and are comfortable for working out. The hook and loop closure allows for quicker adjustments than laces.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisG

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers look good, are easy to put on and are comfortable.....what more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Nike wearer for many years. My daughter bought me a pair of Pumas not too long ago. I really was impressed with their light weight and comfort. Saw this pair on line and decided to try them. Glad I did. Fit is my normal size unlike some other reviewers and I have a fat foot. Comfort is outstanding and the velco closures actually work and are comfortable. Very impressed with Puma! I wore their soccer shoes in my youth and if they keep up the quality and comfort, I will continue with the brand. I would and have highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fly190

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pair of shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe for casual wear. It looks good and is very comfortable. I love not having to worry about laces when I'm in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Abishek

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves these. This is his second pair and they are really comfy. They're convenient because theyre slip ons, but have the comfort of regular sneakers or running shoes. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: NARROW soles/Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super narrow soles and I can feel the edges of the pad liner with my feet. Not a great comfortable feeling. Returned without issue. As always when sold or fulfilled via Amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dix

customer_reviews.title: Small but not too small.
customer_reviews.text: I got a size larger than my normal and its still a bit small. However overall I am very happy with the item and price.
customer_reviews.author: Angad

customer_reviews.title: The germans did it again-GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoes. Fit like a glove! Great Quality and they also look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Germanguy

customer_reviews.title: I love the style of this show
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this show. It's as comfortable though. The shoe kind of narrows a bit, so if you have wide feet, this isn't for you. arch support isn't that great so your feet may get tired after wearing it after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: sixstringking

customer_reviews.title: One shoe fits great the other is a bit snug and rubs blisters ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other comments people offered and ordered a half size larger. One shoe fits great the other is a bit snug and rubs blisters own my heel during my three mile walks. I will make due though. Love the style and will order larger next time.
customer_reviews.author: PopeyeUSN

customer_reviews.title: These shoes smell horrible
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived and I thought everything was fine with them until I started wearing them. They smell horrible!! They were obviously left around water to make them smell like mold. I tried numerous times to clean them and deoderize them with no luck at all. The smell will not go away and I've tried at least a dozen times to make them smell better. If I would have known this before I bought them I certainly wouldn't have gotten them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son LOVES these shoes. Gets many compliments as well at school. He also enjoys the ease of the velcro closure. I read many reviews on this shoe before purchasing and agree you might want to buy 1 size up. We did that and they are perfect. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCodMom

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe but I have wide feet for a skinny guy so the toe of the shoe is pretty tight but other than that great shoes. Hope they will break in more. But over all from toe to heal great fit just a little narrow. Plus can’t beat I slip on Velcro just my style.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: My Fav Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! I had three pairs in different colours a few years ago and could not find seem to find them anywhere else. This is my favourite colour of all that I've had. I can stand 12 hours (as a stylist) behind my chair and be comfortable in these stylish kicks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: These are great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes, they seem to be a bit large (ordered large because the half size was more expensive). Plan to return and switch for a closer fit.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift and they loved them! They fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Puma OSU's are one of my all time favorite shoes. I am middle aged and had heart surgery last year. Because of this i have issues with a numbness in my feet from the balls of my foot through my toes. My feet are sensitive because of this. This shoe and other OSU styles are the most comfortable shoe i have ever worn. You need to buy a half size larger with these shoes as they are narrow. But they are lite and the most comfortable shoe I have had in more then 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L Maus

customer_reviews.title: buy 1/2 size larger than other brands...quality, comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: as mentioned by other purchasers, I bought 1/2 size larger than normal. I have several different puma brand shoes and they all run small. usually i wear an 8 in other shoes such as merrel or cushe. puma's I get 8.5. very comfortable, well made product
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I bought a pair a couple of years ago and I wished I bought 2 pair at the time as they were not available for a while. I noticed they brought them back so this time I was sure to buy 2 pair! They're so comfortable and I love that they don't have laces. Plus I get a ton of compliments on them, so that's nice 😀
customer_reviews.author: T. Mathieson

customer_reviews.title: NOW THEY ARE THE "YARD SHOES" STILL FIT GREAT AND EASY TO SLIP ON
customer_reviews.text: HAD EM WELL OVER 2 YRS. LASTED LONG.. NOW THEY ARE THE "YARD SHOES" STILL FIT GREAT AND EASY TO SLIP ON. LOVE EM.. BOUGHT ANOTHER PAIR TO REPLACE OLD ONES.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish slip on sneakers for adults- a rare find!
customer_reviews.text: Husband will only wear these shoes. I searched high and low for slip on sneakers that didn't look like they were for a toddler or orthopedic and these shoes fit the bill. They are fashionable, comfortable, breath VERY well (husband has sweaty feet) and he can stand in them for more than 12 hours as a school teacher. My brother, who is a sneaker FANATIC, even picked them up and complimented them and ask me where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable... Feels like they were made just for my feet. I like everything about them!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Raley

customer_reviews.title: I love the OSU series
customer_reviews.text: I love the OSU series. I've owned one pair that I used religiously every day for 3 years. Haven't been able to find one for some time and aha what do you know? I stumbled on these. They are absolutely amazing and light. After a week or two they fit your feet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable every day shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Puma osu that I bought. The first pair I've used for every day walking and it was highly comfortable. After 2 years of every day use and some times abuse they still held up well but I decided to just replace them with the new pair
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: this is the best running shoes i have owned. this lasted me about 4 years being used everyday at gym and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Vishan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the ideal shoe i was hoping to get
customer_reviews.text: With all the positive reviews for this shoe i had high hopes of being a really good shoe but the arch support is killing me. My foot is on a wider side from the middle and it keeps on slipping to the side of the shoe rather than remaining in place. Gave me a killing pain in my ankle after i had worn it for a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Adeel

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is Meh
customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs rather narrow, especially near the toes. Too much of a taper for my taste. Seems comfortable , but did not get to fully test out the comfort since I couldn't get past the narrow fitting. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes for Big Feet
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes my 6'5", size 14M husband has ever worn. People tease him about how they look but who cares? They're unique, a nice neutral color, and they help him get through a 13-hour shift on his feet every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: feels good on the foot and has a striking design
customer_reviews.text: This is another successful PUMA product, fits perfectly, feels good on the foot and has a striking design. So far so good; kudos to PUMA (and Amazon)! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Ola Tungee

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. My daughter said they were really cool strap shoes. My little toes fell asleep in the car wearing them which appears to be due to how narrow they are. Length is good, but I did buy a 1/2 size larger than I usually wear based on Amazon's recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieMax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for workout shoes, would have been great if they had better arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it again! What can I say... Right size comfortable fit! Shipped fast, comfortable fit, passed the test of time, great price ;)
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Definitely narrow but I get compliments on them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TupinambisX

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but fit extremely tight
customer_reviews.text: I like how the shoes look, but they fit tight... I have long narrow feet and the straps don't give at all... I was hoping the shoes would break in, but after a week continously wearing them they are still tight... (well at least that's what she said)
customer_reviews.author: Spend-Money-Wisely

customer_reviews.title: Great look, feels like a slipper as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great look, feels like a slipper as much as a sneaker, great for walking around indoors or around town or in the country. Not ideal for hiking probably, as these are too comfortable to provide much support.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Makepeace

customer_reviews.title: Boooo , don't buy if u have a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow shoe , expensive and don't wear them. Could not issue refund. Annoying
customer_reviews.author: Bl123

customer_reviews.title: it seems like even if you go up a size the width ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to try 1 full size up unfortunately these shoes are made so narrow however the support falls... it seems like even if you go up a size the width stays the same.... definetely not for wide feet. great design though.
customer_reviews.author: Six

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker With Nice Feel, But Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is nice and light, feels comfortable and fits my foot very closely. The only problem is I bought an 11.5 and my foot size is 10.5. I anticipated some room and went 0.5 larger than my preferred 11. I'm wishing I bought a size 12 instead of an 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: nBee1

customer_reviews.title: Love da shoes . . .not the size
customer_reviews.text: These Pumas are a fantastic slip-on shoe. Love the color selections as well. The only issue is the size. These shoes tend to run small. I ended up getting a full size up from my usual size. I love the Puma brand and would buy another pair in a heart beat. These shoes were shipped out quick which is always a plus. Thanks. Another happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dela Rosa

customer_reviews.title: the typical wear and tear goes fast on these i ...
customer_reviews.text: the typical wear and tear goes fast on these i have an older shoe from under armor that lasted longer than these, office use not running
customer_reviews.author: gznite

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair several months after the first pair, they are both in great shape abut wanted it for the far off future. Lots of positive comments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Haven't had a chance to work out in them yet..
customer_reviews.author: BROOKDawg1

customer_reviews.title: I do like the snug feel of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size, but could hardly get them on and even though there is not much arch support, I do like the snug feel of this shoe. I've returned the first pair and reordered the next bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Witherspoon

customer_reviews.title: Who were these shoes designed for???
customer_reviews.text: Man, they fit so narrow, I just can't imagine... And I have narrow feet!!! Seriously, DO NOT buy these shoes if your feet are more than 3 inches wide at the widest point...They will squeeze the hell out of your feet. You've been warned...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe to work out in and this seems to be the one. Some reviews said the shoe is too small when dealing with the size. I do not think it is the size but the width. It does tend to fit tighter around the arch, but that could be a good thing. I believe because I have a narrow foot that this is the reason it doesn't bother me much. A half size larger could be too big, but it is hard to say without going to a Puma outlet and trying their shoes on for reference. Other wise, fits nice, and breathes pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bosher

customer_reviews.title: These "running shoes" fit great as far as length and width -- perfect
customer_reviews.text: These "running shoes" fit great as far as length and width -- perfect. Unfortunately, I bought them to run in, and they are not suited to that purpose as they have NO ARCH. they are flat like a house slipper. if you want to run in them go ahead. i'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: al b.

customer_reviews.title: Really stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so stylish and comfortable. I wish there were more colors!
customer_reviews.author: joy777

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I notice I have to walk in them after it feel right on my feet. Once I put them on they feel tight but once I start to walk it will stretch a little but after wearing it. The sneaker will go back to original size. I bought them to because I will be walking a lot to loose the weight plus I hate to tie my sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm just used this shoes only for walk , and their start breaking .. The quality it's really POOR . It's a really expensive shoes to be in good conditions only for 3 weeks. I don't know , but I don't recommend this shoes to anybody . And the other problem it's , you can't get a replace or refund. You buy it and you are done. I'm not sure how this works but if you sell a product and less than a month it's break.... Where is the guarantee? Must have...
customer_reviews.author: Facundo G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Slip on!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is only slightly short. I'm keeping them. This would be a grand slam if the sole was softer, more cushion. Good Looking slip on!
customer_reviews.author: ScooterPop

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Don't have to mess with laces. Fit great and very comfortable. Great for my age group.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Arnold

customer_reviews.title: but I am used to the excellent support of New Balance shoes and these don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Ice shoe, but I am used to the excellent support of New Balance shoes and these don't have that.
customer_reviews.author: Karl D. Riemer

customer_reviews.title: Tough to put on without a shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to put on. There is little height for instep to slip on the shoe. It's a little like trying to put on a laced-up shoe.
customer_reviews.author: R L

customer_reviews.title: Odd Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 different pair of the Puma Cross Training shoe and loved them. I purchase yet another pair and they came with a very odd smell. Almost musty. I returned them and ask for another pair. They came with the same smell and I know they were not the same pair. The smell was so bad I had to keep them on the outside deck till I returned them. Would love another pair but not sure what I would get a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Sport

customer_reviews.title: They looked great, but too small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my husband. He 12 or 13 and sometimes needs a wide shoe, so I knew going in that I was taking a chance getting a 12M. Unfortunately they were both too short and too narrow. I gave it four stars because I really can't pin it on the manufacturer. My husband is one of those who really needs to try the shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and snug fit for sneakers that have no laces.
customer_reviews.author: s.pow

customer_reviews.title: He says they are very comfortable. They don't have very good arch support
customer_reviews.text: They run small. Ordered the next size up. He says they are very comfortable. They don't have very good arch support. We purchased some insoles and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickles

customer_reviews.title: Smart and comfortable but not for running
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them. They are comfortable and true to size. They also look smart. However, they are not running shoes. Buy them for walking. Do not expect them to help you if you are looking for running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: They fit snugly and I like that I don't have to fool around lacing them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed a bit small at first especially the left one. (My left foot is slightly larger) but I have had no problems with the shoes. They fit snugly and I like that I don't have to fool around lacing them. Just close the Velcro strap and they are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off, and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size larger since some reviews said Pumas run a little small, and they are perfect. I like the ease of putting on and taking off these shoes...not having to mess with laces. Good cushioning and comfortable fit. They are very new so i assume the fit will only get better. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RodneyPaul

customer_reviews.title: Amazon replaced them and the new pair have been good for a few weeks now
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of these I got, the right shoe started "squeaking" after a few days, Amazon replaced them and the new pair have been good for a few weeks now. SUPER comfortable and very ventilated, really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Javad Shadzi

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens OSU NM-M OSU Nm-m
product_meta.description: PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Laceless cross-trainer featuring synthetic suede straps layered over mesh with hook-and-loop closure
